page.title: 16Media
page.content:
Queen and to keep the Guide Law.Amen." {Local Newspapers. } There are two local newspapers serving the area, The Shropshire Star (Northern Edition),an evening paper, and The Oswestry Advertiser (The 'Tizer') published weekly. There is also a village news sheet The Magnet, published quarterly and containing village news,views and articles by local people. The following poem gives some idea of the items in this paper. A Farmer's Tale There is a nearby farmer Frank Hickson is his name He's got his farm near Criftins Where profit is his aim.
He's known as so progressive He farms the modern way With buildings and machinery
